question: I have a dog that was diagnosed with diabetes approximately 6 weeks ago.  She gets two insulin shots a day (7 a.m. and 7 p.m.).  With daylight savings time now here, will it work to give her shots at 8 a.m. and 8 p.m. (since it's really still 7 and 7)?
title: Insulin shots and Daylight Savings Time
